StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [GetProgramCodeByContractID]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body: ( @ContractID int ) AS SELECT PG.PROGRAM_CODE, PG.PROGRAM_TYPE, PA.PROGRAM_ASSIGNMENT_DATE, ISNULL(C.DUTY_PREFERENCE1, '00') AS DUTY_PREFERENCE1 FROM PROGRAM_AVAILABILITY PA WITH (NOLOCK) INNER JOIN CONTRACT C ON PA.CONTRACT_ID = C.CONTRACT_ID INNER JOIN PROGRAM PG ON PA.PROGRAM_ID = PG.PROGRAM_ID WHERE PA.CONTRACT_ID = @ContractID
